basic.description: Studies in the textiles and dress of selected periods with a focus upon visual culture and/or material culture.
basic.subject: ARTH
basic.title: Studies in the History of Textiles and Dress

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites    A GPA of 2.6 in a minium of 24.0 units in ARTH and Level 4 and registration in an ARTH Major or Medial Plan.
